key.name: database
key.description: The name of the default individual database or meta-database to use on a dictionary source. An exclamation mark ("!") means that all the databases present in a dictionary source should be searched

key.name: strategy
key.summary: The default search strategy to use
key.description: The name of the default search strategy to use on a dictionary source, if available. The default strategy is 'exact', that is match exact words.

key.name: print-font
key.summary: The font to be used when printing
key.description: The font to be used when printing a definition.

key.name: source-name
key.summary: The name of the dictionary source used
key.description: The name of the dictionary source used to retrieve the definitions of words.
